Indian Taco Deluxe
Fried bannock topped with seasoned taco grounded beef lettuce, cheese & tomatoes with a side of sour cream & salsa sauce.

Small Indian Taco Deluxe
Small Indian Taco Deluxe
Bannock Lady's small Indian tacos are made with a half (1/2) piece of fried bannock, cut in half, topped with taco seasoned grounded beef, cheese, lettuce, and diced tomatoes. Comes with sour cream and salsa on the side.

$10.00
Large Indian Taco Deluxe
Large Indian Taco Deluxe
Bannock Lady's large Indian tacos are made with a full piece of fried bannock, cut in half, topped with taco seasoned grounded beef, cheese, lettuce, and diced tomatoes. Comes with sour cream and salsa on the side.
